name: Eden
short_description:
Eden is a script-based tool to simplify the process of running large numbers of similar jobs on multiple processors--whether it's a single laptop with four cores or a HPC large shared memory machine with 1024 cores and a job scheduler.
The development of Eden was supported primarily by the Office of Cyber Infrastructure of the NSF under Award Number ARRA-NSF-OCI-0906324 for NICS-RDAV center and NSF-OCI-1136246 for support of undergraduate research in the NICS-RDAV center.
